attributes.action: cheaper season ticket prices in premier league!
attributes.additional_details: We are working on a twitter account but due to technical difficulties we cannot at the moment. We also have one at change.org if you would like to see please click the link. https://www.change.org/p/the-fa-capped-premier-league-season-ticket-prices?recruiter=461767594&utm_source=share_for_starters&utm_medium=copyLink
attributes.background: We think in England the price for a Premier League team is disgusting. We want to help lower the price. With your signature we can slowly put more and more pressure onto the FA and they will realize how expensive season tickets cost. Barcelona season ticket is 4 times cheaper than stoke. Awful!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government and Parliament do not control the price of Premier League tickets.

You could ask the Government or Parliament to offer incentives for clubs to reduce the price of tickets - for example, through the tax system.
